RETURN_PURCHASE_DATE = #{returnPurchaseDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, RETURN_PURCHASE_TIME = #{returnPurchaseTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, SEQ_NO = #{seqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_COUPON = #{isCoupon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mapper.select: select ORDER_ID, CONTACTS_NAME, CONTACTS_PHONE, CONTACTS_EMAIL, VISITOR_NAME, VISITOR_GENDER, VISITOR_PHONE, VISITOR_ID_TYPE, VISITOR_ID_NUM, VISITOR_EMAIL, VISITOR_AGE from T_SPO_ORDER_DETAIL_INFO t where t.order_id = #{orderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
